transformations.name: RemoveDuplicates
transformations.description: Remove duplicate UWSIGN from LCC and LCA

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		lccuwsign as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select lccuwsign from dwh_stage.p_lcctable',
	format: 'query') ~> lcctable
source(output(
		lcauwsign as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select lcauwsign from dwh_stage.p_lcatable',
	format: 'query') ~> lcatable
source(output(
		sigsign as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select sigsign from dwh_stage.p_sigtable',
	format: 'query') ~> sigtable
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select * from dwh_stage.t_crossreference',
	format: 'query') ~> crossreference
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		uwsign = lccuwsign
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicates
lcctable, lcatable union(byName: false)~> Union1
crossreference filter(code_type_id==329 && source_system=='PARIS') ~> Filter1
sigtable, Filter1 lookup(sigsign == source_code_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
RemoveDuplicates, Lookup1 join(uwsign == sigsign,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, Filter1 join(sigsign == crossreference@source_code_key,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
